83060.summary: Some customers in the Broadway Assiniboine area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83060.title: Sept 15 - Winnipeg (Broadway Assiniboine) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
